resources.string: Please your give correct information because your email & phone number needs to be verified.
You can find a large number of people to build up friendship
RubixChat is completely FREE of cost, no subscription fees.
One to one and Many to many chatting system
This application is built for learning purpose.\nProject Source Code Link-
"Contacts permissions are needed for providing email completions."
No internet connection! Please check internet.
Registered successfully.\nVerification email has been sent.\nPlease verify email.
To save your changes, please check/recheck your GENDER.

• User registration with e-mail and password.

 • Email Verification with VERIFIED Profile TAG 

 • Supports text and image messages in personal as well as in group chats. 

 • Image cropping and Image Size Compressing facility in all image uploads for greater performance. 

 • Global Searching Mechanism to find any registered users. 

 • Send Friend Request to a person, Cancel, Un-friend and Decline request mechanism. 

 • No spam messages since only your friends can send you messages. 

 • Displaying Last Seen Time / Online Active Status of Users on Chat. 

 • Offline loading capability (as like Messenger, WhatsApp and others). 

 • Network Connectivity checker. 

 • New message and new friend request NOTIFICATION (Coming soon).

This app module can be easily integrated to any Android applications to facilitate one-to-one and one-to-many messaging services, thereby allowing developers to concentrate on the main functionality of their app. Contact developer to get the full code.
RubixChat is a simple, lightweight messaging application build with clean code and fully customizable layouts for easy integration to other natively build Android applications.
